Research

Our Research

Accelerate Science pursues research at the interface of AI and the sciences, generating new scientific insights from advanced data analysis and developing AI methods that can be deployed to advance scientific knowledge. This research is carried out in partnership with a community of scientists and AI specialists passionate about the use of AI to benefit science and society.
